info.title: Workable
info.description:
The Workable connector can be used in the following ways:

Extract information about your:
account
hiring members
pipeline stages
jobs 
scheduled events
job's and/or candidate's activity

Manage your candidates by:
Fetching candidates
Extracting detail candidate info

get.description: Get Candidates: Returns a collection of the job's candidates.
Get Candidates by ID: Returns specified candidate.
Get Accounts: Returns a collection of all the accounts you have access to.
Get Job Activities by shortcode: Returns the activity stream of the given job.

parameters.name: shortcode
parameters.x-ms-summary: Get Job Activities by shortcode: Returns the activity stream of the given job.

get.description: Get Events: Returns a collection of your events.
Get Events by ID: Returns date for the identified event.

parameters.name: id
parameters.x-ms-summary: Get Events by ID: Returns date for the identified event.

post.description: Post a Subscription: Subscribe to an event.

target.description: The URL of the endpoint to push notifications at
target.title: target

stage_slug.description: Get notifications for specific stages. e.g. 'hired'. Not required
stage_slug.title: stage_slug
